shell: cd ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION} && composer update 2>&1 && composer install 2>&1 && composer dump-autoload 2>&1

install.title: Install tSuite
install.description: Copies the files to the install location

shell: cp -r ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION}/www/* ${INSTALL_LOCATION_WWW} && echo "No errors while copying from ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION}/www/* to ${INSTALL_LOCATION_WWW}" || "There was a problem copying the files from ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION}/www/* to ${INSTALL_LOCATION_WWW}"

mkdir ${INSTALL_LOCATION_WWW}/vendor; cp -r ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION}/vendor/* ${INSTALL_LOCATION_WWW}/vendor && echo "No errors while copying from ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION}/vendor/* to ${INSTALL_LOCATION_WWW}/vendor" || "There was a problem copying the files from ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION}/vendor/* to ${INSTALL_LOCATION_WWW}/vendor"
